amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Federal Prison System, Buildings and Facilities, by $2.2 million and increases funding for Veterans Treatment Courts by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Federal Prison System (Buildings and Facilities) by $2.2 million and to increase Office of Justice Programs (State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance) by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Connolly.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
